sn21.4:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annataro navo bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto viharam pavisitva appossukko tunhibhuto sankasayati, na bhikkhunam veyyavaccam karoti civarakarasamaye.
sn21.4:1.3: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn21.4:1.4: “idha, bhante, annataro navo bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto viharam pavisitva appossukko tunhibhuto sankasayati, na bhikkhunam veyyavaccam karoti civarakarasamaye”ti.
sn21.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
sn21.4:2.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena tam bhikkhum amantehi ‘sattha tam, avuso, amanteti’”ti.
sn21.4:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn21.4:2.5: “Evamavuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho tam bhikkhum bhagava etadavoca:
sn21.4:2.6: “saccam kira tvam, bhikkhu, pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto viharam pavisitva appossukko tunhibhuto sankasayasi, na bhikkhunam veyyavaccam karosi civarakarasamaye”ti?
sn21.4:3.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa bhikkhuno cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya bhikkhu amantesi:
sn21.4:3.2: “ma kho tumhe, bhikkhave, etassa bhikkhuno ujjhayittha.
sn21.4:3.3: Eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, yassa catthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
sn21.4:4.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
